name: Angels & Demons | 2022 Demo
description:
What is Angels & Demons?

Angels & Demons is a Platformer/RPG. It incorporates fluid platformer movement with a reactive turn-based battle system.

What is it about?

The barrier that separates The Living Realm from The Spiritual Realm has been broken! It's up to you, and your guardian angel Yui to find The Seven Runes of Virtue; which are needed to repair the barrier and banish the demons back to The Spiritual Realm!

Is it finished?

This is still a very early version of the game. You can follow the development and interact with the community in my discord server! Please also submit bug reports to the #bug-reports channel in the discord server if possible.  Join the server with this link!
